name: Start GumDrop Event
description: Admin action to start a new GumDrop reward event with custom timeframe and reward amount

arguments.name: endTime
arguments.label: End Time (Unix timestamp)
arguments.description: When the drop expires (e.g., 1729972800.0 for 72 hours later)

arguments.name: gumPerFlunk
arguments.label: GUM Reward Amount
arguments.description: How much GUM each Flunk holder can claim

messages.title: Start GumDrop Event
messages.description: This will activate a new GumDrop event. All eligible Flunk holders will be able to claim during the specified time window.
messages.successDescription: The GumDrop event is now active. Users can claim their rewards.
messages.errorDescription: Unable to start the event. Check that you are the contract owner and parameters are valid.
